entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 early this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
